scheme_name: Free Travel in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to Widowed Daughters-in-law of Freedom Fighters
brief_description: "Free Travel in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to Widowed Daughters-in-law of Freedom Fighters" is a social welfare scheme that provides free transport services in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to the widowed daughters-in-laws of the Freedom Fighters of the state.
detailed_description: "Free Travel in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to Widowed Daughters-in-law of Freedom Fighters" is a social welfare scheme implemented by the Home Department, Government of Uttarakhand. Under this scheme, free transport services are provided in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to the widowed daughters-in-laws of the Freedom Fighters of the state.
benefits: Free transport services in Uttarakhand Transport Corporation Buses to the widowed Daughters-in-laws of the Freedom Fighters of the state.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Uttarakhand. The applicant should be a widowed daughter-in-law of a Freedom Fighters. The applicant should have a valid Identity card for travel issued from the office of the District Magistrate.

steps: Step 1: The applicant needs to collect the prescribed application form from the office of the District Magistrate. Step 2: Attach all the mandatory documents (Self-attested, if required) along with the application form. Step 3: Submit the application at the office of the District Magistrate. Step 4: After the successful verification, an Identity card will be provided to the applicant.

documents_required: Application form. Any other documents as required.
